body_html:
In the future you should ask usage questions like these on StackOverflow. However...

You probably are looking for gather_nd does indirect indexing,. On the other hand, that is not necessary and gather_nd does not yet have a gradient. So instead do

(y_true - tf.cast(tf.not_equal(y_true, 0), tf.float32) * y_pred)**2

body:
In the future you should ask usage questions like these on StackOverflow. However...

You probably are looking for gather_nd does indirect indexing,. On the other hand, that is not necessary and gather_nd does not yet have a gradient. So instead do

``` python
(y_true - tf.cast(tf.not_equal(y_true, 0), tf.float32) * y_pred)**2
```
